alert.note: Alert for Lower Tangipahoa; Southern Livingston; Southwestern St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 28 at 8:51PM CST until November 29 at 8:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 8 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 expected. * WHERE...Southwestern St. Tammany, Lower Tangipahoa and Southern Livingston Parishes. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 8 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...A Freeze Warning means sub-freezing temperatures are imminent or highly likely. These conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Bring your pets indoors, or if your pets must stay outside ensure they have warm bedding and an unfrozen water source. Ensure that your space heaters are properly placed to avoid the risk of a fire.

area.areaDesc: Lower Tangipahoa; Southern Livingston; Southwestern St. Tammany
